of which I con <s>sidered <\s> ceived were very probably 
sinuses - Sheaths of this tissue were 
particularly conspicuous along the nerves 
On examining the anus however I found 
that the oblique markings <s>on their s<\s>
which have given rise to the supposition 
that they are surrounded by muscular bands 
proceeded from trabeculae of a similar 
structure which took a curved course from 
a canal which lies at the base of the [text?]
(not the great canal of the anus, of course)
round the <s>convex side <\s> of the anus &
terminated by breaking up into a 
network - These trabeculae however were 
not solid but <s>certainly <\s> hollow & the 
interspaces between them were solid.
The network into which they broke up <s>again <\s>
was distinctly formed by canals - and
